title: Sunphosate 360SL (Glyphosate Herbicide | 1L)
fullDescription: Sunphosate is a systemic, non-selective herbicide used for controlling annual and perennial weeds. It contains 360g Glyphosate per liter...

title: Precision Seed and Fertilizer Planter
fullDescription: The precision seed and fertilizer planter is a manually operated machine with double compartments for seedling and fertilizers. It enables rapid planting, prevents overcrowding, and improves crop health and development...

title: High Quality Knapsack Sprayer (Various Brands) 16 Litres
fullDescription: The manually operated Knapsack sprayer is a piece of high-quality spraying equipment used to apply herbicides, pesticides, and fertilizers on agricultural crops and lands. Ideal for the home gardener, pest control, and fumigation...

title: ButaForce ®(Pre-Emergence | Selective | Systemic Herbicide)
shortDescription: A pre-emergence herbicide for annual weeds...
fullDescription: Butaforce is a chloroacetanilide class herbicide known for its pre-emergent activity on weeds. It is indicated for pre-emergence control of annual grasses and some broad-leaved weeds, particularly in rice crops...

title: Vitamin A D E (1 Liter)
shortDescription: A liquid feed supplement for poultry...
fullDescription: This liquid feed supplement for poultry comes in 1 Litre packs containing a powerful combination of vitamins. It is recommended for all laying birds, broilers, and growers...

title: Lavaside
fullDescription: Lavaside is a product designed to keep farms fly-free and poultry manure odourless. Available in 250g and 25kg packaging...

title: Miavit V.T.A Liquid
fullDescription: Miavit V.T.A liquid is a poultry feed supplement that promotes healthy growth and boosts overall bird performance. Comes in 1L packs...

title: Weedoff Contact Herbicide 1 Litre
shortDescription: A contact weed killer containing paraquat...
fullDescription: Weedoff is a contact herbicide recommended for the control of broadleaf weeds and grasses in arable land. It contains paraquat as the active ingredient...
